law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 158, sec. 9, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 3, effective June 25, 2009. -- Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 159, sec. 1, effective July 12, 2006.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2006). Under the authority of KRS 7.136(1), the Reviser of Statutes has changed the internal numbering system in this statute, inserting subsection numbers [(1), (2), and (3)] in place of paragraph designations [(a), (b), and (c)] and deleting the subsection number at the beginning of the statute. The words in the text were not changed.
